#summary How to run?

= Introduction =

{{{
$ svn checkout http://mu-assessment.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ mu-assessment
$ cd mu-assessment
$ mvn package
$ cd target
$ cp mu-assessment-1.0-SNAPSHOT.war $CATALINA_HOME/webapps
$ firefox http://localhost:8080/mu
}}}

= Details =

Also you will try

{{{
$ svn checkout http://mu-assessment.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ mu-assessment
$ cd mu-assessment
$ mvn jetty:run-war
$ firefox http://localhost:8080/mu
}}}
